info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 1:25AM CDT until May 15 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CRAIG AND NORTHERN MAYES COUNTIES... At 125 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Adair, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Pryor Creek... Langley... Adair... Spavinaw... Big Cabin... Pensacola... Hoot Owl... Spavinaw State Park... Strang... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 263 and 279. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
